long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an incredible journey of challenge and self discovery!

Explore a randomly generated 3-dimensional maze from the comfort of your web browser of choice.

Use WASD to move in the current plane. Press P to move down a level, press L to move up a level.
You can only move down levels on a green tile.
You can only move up levels on a red tile.
You can move down or up levels on a white tile.
Reach the bottom right tile of the top level as quickly as possible!
